column1: '''''Dreams & Gifts: The Art of Angelo Montanini''''' is an Italian-language collection of illustrations by [[Angelo Montanini]]. Most illustrations are inspired by the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: Tolkien]], although a few have themes from other fantasy worlds.
